Create New Variable

Back to Variables
Variable Configuration
Variable name can only contain letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, and underscores. This will be used in URLs.
Enter the variable value or definition. This can be any text content you want to associate with this variable.
Load the saved value from a template and adjust it before saving.
1 template
Describe how the AI should adjust the variable definition before saving.
No interactions yet.
Disable a variable to keep its value out of request contexts.
